products.name: Galaxy S22 | S22+
products.description: Light up your life with a professional camera that gives you bright, sharp photos and videos, whether it's at night or anytime inspiration strikes.

products.name: Motorola Edge
products.description: Dreaming of the perfect 5G phone? With motorola edge, stream and download your favorite content on blazing-fast 5G, and watch on an immersive Endless Edge display with the most powerful stereo speakers ever2.

products.name: Moto G Stylus
products.description: Find new ways to express yourself with a versatile camera system, built-in stylus, and blazing-fast performance.

products.name: Motorola Razr
products.description: To build the best modern foldable phone, we re-thought the mechanical and industrial design. Completely transforming your smartphone experience.

products.name: Motorola One
products.description: 5G speed is the future, and motorola one 5G ace is bringing it to everyone.  Enjoy superfast 5G speed that lets you download movies in seconds1, plus a battery that lasts for over 2 days2.

products.name: Xiaomi Civi 1s
products.description: The Xiaomi Civi 1S phone is a novelty that will delight fans of miniature smartphones. The gadget is small and lightweight, so it easy to fit even in small pockets.

products.name: Redmi Note 11T Pro+
products.description: Smartphone Mi Note 11T Pro + can surprise you with broad functionality. Among them is fast charging. It is what significantly differentiates this device from its close relative Mi Note 11T Pro.

products.name: Redmi 10A
products.description: Redmi 10A is a new smartphone that will delight you with its liberal price. However, despite the low cost, the gadget has extensive functionality.

products.name: Black Shark 5 Pro
products.description: Black Shark 5 Pro is a smartphone that is designed to perform resource-intensive tasks. For this reason, the device has sunk into the hearts of all kinds of gamers so much!
